name: Frondend Signup Site Clone
author: Peidong Hu

sections.description:
This plugin has to be installed in a multi-site WP deployment.
Administrator need to choose which existing site will be used as template.
This pluging works with both existing user or new user when signup through wp-signup.php.
sections.installation:
1. unzip the plugin
  2. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress. NOTE: Activation has to be applied to network scope.
  4. In main site administrator menu, click ‘Signup Site Clone’ to set the template site.
sections.faq:
= Do I need other plugins to work with this one?= No.

I got error ‘Maybe we had an error updating the options table with the new data.’

Usually, this is because the template site is not set up yet on your main site administration page. You have to do step 4 in your installation.

short_description: In multi-site deployment of WP, this plugin will clone an existing site when frontend user (new or existing) signup through wp-signup.php.
description:
This plugin has to be installed in a multi-site WP deployment.
Administrator need to choose which existing site will be used as template.
This pluging works with both existing user or new user when signup through wp-signup.php.
